channel.title: never sleep
channel.description: never sleep is a weekly hour-long podcast featuring the latest and best in indie rock, hip-hop, and electronica. Weekly features include Vinyl Archaeology (rare or vinyl-only cuts) and Pop Cult music news.
channel.copyright: All songs are the property of their respective copyright holders. I only aim to expose listeners to new music so that they may in turn support the artists. If you have legal rights to any of the songs presented here and wish to have them removed, please contact me.
channel.itunes:author: Justin Smith
channel.itunes:summary: never sleep is a weekly hour-long podcast featuring the latest and best in indie rock, hip-hop, and techno. Weekly features include Vinyl Archaeology (rare or vinyl-only cuts) and Pop Cult music news.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Never Sleep is a weekly show that podcasts new music, vinyl obscurities & pop culture news.

item.title: seriously, i don't sleep: podcast #6
item.description: Music from Sonic Youth & Rilo Kiley, Zombie soundtrack tunes, a new Bloc Party track bootleged from Coachella, a block of techno, plus my standard ounce of CHARM.
item.itunes:author: Justin Smith
item.itunes:summary: Music from Sonic Youth & Rilo Kiley, Zombie soundtrack tunes, a new Bloc Party track bootleged from Coachella, a block of techno, plus my standard ounce of CHARM.

item.title: settlin in: podcast #5
item.description: The Pipettes, So Many Dynamos, icelandic rawk from Thor's Hammer, leaked music from The Roots, news on The Hold Steady & Bob Dylan, and Andrew Lloyd Weber (?!).
item.itunes:author: Justin Smith
item.itunes:summary: The Pipettes, So Many Dynamos, icelandic rawk from Thor's Hammer, leaked music from The Roots, news on The Hold Steady & Bob Dylan, and Andrew Lloyd Weber (?!).

item.title: shine on: podcast #4
item.description: Cut Chemist, Razorlight & Thom Yorke in Kick Start! Dutch Big Beat in Vinyl Archaeology! The Killers in Leak of the Week! A tribute to Syd Barrett in Home Stretch! I've had too much espresso! NEVER SLEEP!
item.itunes:author: Justin Smith
item.itunes:summary: Cut Chemist, Razorlight & Thom Yorke in Kick Start! Dutch Big Beat in Vinyl Archaeology! The Killers in Leak of the Week! A tribute to Syd Barrett in Home Stretch! I've had too much espresso! NEVER SLEEP!

item.title: "workin hard or hardly workin?": podcast #3
item.description: This week's show features Art Brut, live Wolf Parade, leaked TV on The Radio, some Japanese garage-psych, and a brand new Brand New Heavies track. Dig it.
item.itunes:author: Justin Smith
item.itunes:summary: This week's show features Art Brut, live Wolf Parade, leaked TV on The Radio, some Japanese garage-psych, and a brand new Brand New Heavies track. Dig it.

item.title: we have liftoff
item.description: Welcome to the first never sleep podcast. Enjoy, and see the blog for a tracklist.
item.itunes:author: Justin Smith
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the first never sleep podcast. Enjoy, and see the blog for a tracklist.
